CustomField.formula: IF(AND (RecordType.DeveloperName ='SSA', OR( (UPPER(Nokia_Legal_Entity_lookup__r.Name)= 'NOKIA CANADA INC.'), (UPPER(Nokia_Legal_Entity_lookup__r.Name)= 'NOKIA OF AMERICA CORPORATION'))), CLM_Nokia_Signer_2__r.Email , IF(AND (RecordType.DeveloperName ='NDA', (UPPER(Nokia_Legal_Entity_lookup__r.Name) = 'NOKIA SOLUTIONS AND NETWORKS AUSTRALIA PTY. LTD.')), CLM_Nokia_Signer_2__r.Email , NULL))
CustomField.label: Recipient 2
